beacon.admin_cli.main(pfad, args)¶

Maintaining the Database.

Parameters

  • pfad – the path to the database.db

  • args – the flag which was entered in the command line

beacon.user_cli.main()¶

var_str = user input Output (print): Annotated Variant the function receives some command parameters like the Variant string or help host$ python beacon.user_cli.py var_str

Examples¶

This a usage of beacon.admin_cli():

>>> python3 -m beacon.admin_cli -h
>>> DB Path: *give the working directory of data.db file*

with `-h` or `--help` you can see which flag you can use.
